title: Replace site logo with newly submitted image

requirements.text: Replace the currently used NK SYSTECH logo image with the newly uploaded logo (nk.png) while keeping the existing logo asset path used by the UI: /assets/generated/nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png. The updated logo must appear anywhere that path is used (including the header and footer) without requiring code changes to the img src path.
acceptanceCriteria: The file at frontend/public/assets/generated/nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png is replaced/updated using the provided nk.png artwork (properly resized/cropped as needed).
The header logo and footer logo continue to reference /assets/generated/nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png and display the new uploaded logo correctly.
No other site images (e.g., hero/banner) are changed.

constraints: Do not change the existing logo asset path referenced by the UI: /assets/generated/nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png.

Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything in frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Redesigning the header/footer layout or changing any text content.
Updating backend logic or data models.

edits: Replace the site logo with the newly uploaded image (nk.png > nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png)
